original_definition: 'horizontally integrated undertaking' means an undertaking performing at least one of the functions of production, transmission, distribution, supply or storage of natural gas, and a non-gas activity;
generated_definition: 'horizontally integrated undertaking' means an undertaking that has a significant degree of integration in one or more markets or industries, often through the acquisition or creation of a network of subsidiaries, joint ventures, or other business relationships.

Article\u00a02: ‘horizontally integrated undertaking’ means an undertaking performing at least one of the functions of production, transmission, distribution, supply or storage of natural gas, and a non-gas activity;
